Posts.Content: My 69 yr old mother was diagnosed with Inflammatory Breast Cancer on Friday. Her 86 year old mother is in the last stages of life dying of breast cancer. I would like to know a few things...What is inflammatory breast cancer? I know what the doctors are going to do for her, but what is it? Is it bad kind, good kind what? Also what is the best thing I can do to help her through it ALL? Also, sorry to be a pest, I am 46 years old, what is the best advice for me for prevention?? Thanks for listening.
Posts.Title: Inflammatory Breast Cancer
